title: What Is the Prize Money for the NYC Marathon?
description: The men’s and women’s winners will receive $100,000. The wheelchair winners got less — but made up for some of it with bonuses.
dc:creator: Nadav Gavrielov

media:content.media:credit: Anna Watts for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Sharon Lokedi and Evans Chebet, the top finishers in the women’s and men’s races, will each receive $100,000.
